Kirsten Gillibrand , a member of the Senate Armed Services Committee, said, We need a commitment by Secretaries Janet Napolitano and Robert Gates to work with local communities along the border to make sure they have the resources to solve this problem and keep communities across the state safe from drug-related violence. 's conference call, much was stressed on Page "being ready," writes Forbes' Quentin Hardy. Eric Schmidt added that Page had "lots of ideas that are interesting and clever." Larry Page is likely to be a very capable chief executive at Google- as long as the rules don't change, and he has to prove he is a businessman, Hardy adds.
